name: Zombie Rush (Leigh Norton)
description:
Zombie Rush

A Tower Defense/Plants vs Zombies style game

Zombie Rush features:

  • 3 Difficulty Modes
  • Resource System
  • Multiple Zombie Types
  • Multiple Defense Characters
  • 10 Levels with Increasing Difficulty

How long can you last against the zombie horde?!

Controls:

Menu:

Mouse - Select Menu Options

In Game: 

Mouse  - Select and Place Defenders

Credits:

Sprites and music from https://opengameart.org/

Zombie Sprites - CraftPix.net 2D Game Assets

Defender Sprites - pzUH

Music - MAcro

Zombie Sound Effects - artisticdude
